verses.verse: The elders <S%G4245><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> I exhort, <S%G3870><s%> who am also an elder, <S%G4850><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> also a partaker <S%G2844><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> that shall <S%G3195><s%> be revealed: <S%G601><s%>

Feed <S%G4165><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flock <S%G4168><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> taking the oversight <S%G1983><s%> thereof, not <S%G3361><s%> by constraint, <S%G317><s%> but <S%G235><s%> willingly; <S%G1596><s%> not <S%G3366><s%> for filthy lucre, <S%G147><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of a ready mind; <S%G4290><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> being lords over <S%G2634><s%> God's heritage, <S%G2819><s%> but <S%G235><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> examples <S%G5179><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> flock. <S%G4168><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> chief Shepherd <S%G750><s%> shall appear, <S%G5319><s%> ye shall receive <S%G2865><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> that fadeth not away. <S%G262><s%>

Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> ye younger, <S%G3501><s%> submit yourselves <S%G5293><s%> unto the elder. <S%G4245><s%> Yea, <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you be subject <S%G5293><s%> one to another, <S%G240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be clothed with <S%G1463><s%> humility: <S%G5012><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> resisteth <S%G498><s%> the proud, <S%G5244><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to the humble. <S%G5011><s%>

Humble yourselves <S%G5013><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mighty <S%G2900><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may exalt <S%G5312><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> due time: <S%G2540><s%>

Casting <S%G1977><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> care <S%G3308><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> careth <S%G3199><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

Be sober, <S%G3525><s%> be vigilant; <S%G1127><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> adversary <S%G476><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a roaring <S%G5612><s%> lion, <S%G3023><s%> walketh about, <S%G4043><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> he may devour: <S%G2666><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> resist <S%G436><s%> steadfast <S%G4731><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> afflictions <S%G3804><s%> are accomplished <S%G2005><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> brethren <S%G81><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> who hath called <S%G2564><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G848><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> after that ye have suffered <S%G3958><s%> a while, <S%G3641><s%> make you perfect, <S%G2675><s%> <S%G5209><s%> establish, <S%G4741><s%> strengthen, <S%G4599><s%> settle <S%G2311><s%> you.
To him <S%G846><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> forever and ever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

By <S%G1223><s%> Silvanus, <S%G4610><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I suppose, <S%G3049><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> briefly, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3641><s%> exhorting, <S%G3870><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> testifying <S%G1957><s%> that this <S%G5026><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> the true <S%G227><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> wherein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye stand. <S%G2476><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> church that is at <S%G1722><s%> Babylon, <S%G897><s%> elected together with <S%G4899><s%> you, saluteth <S%G782><s%> you; <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> so doth Mark <S%G3138><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> ye one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a kiss <S%G5370><s%> of charity. <S%G26><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be with you <S%G5213><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
